Interests

Apart from being an Engineering student I enjoy nature and the outdoors. I’m an avid road cyclist. I also work at my families stable where I do all sorts of things related to horses, from training to feeding I love everything in the equine world.

When not outside I like to watch movies and play videogames. I’m a family oriented person so every moment I get to spend with them is priceless. I’m a computer hardware enthusiast so I spend quite a bit of my free time researching the latest hardware and new innovations in that space.
